snippet: A policy had prohibited inmates from receiving books unless they had earned the right through good behavior to buy them through the Prison Service.
abstract: British Justice Lawrence Collins strikes down ban on sending books to prisoners, policy opposed by country's poet laureate Carol Ann Duffy and others.
